=Introduction=

<p><strong>cTDMS</strong> is a Python package to read or write TDMS or TDM files.</p>
<p>TDMS or TDM are file formats developed by National Instruments and are the main file formats
for data storage in LabView from National Instruments.</p>
<p><strong>cTDMS</strong> is using the  NILIBDDC library from National Instruments, which is accessed by the help of the Python <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">ctypes</span></tt> package.</p>
